Module 3 looks at data. Specifically you will learn how to use Jupyter Notebooks to access data, interpret it, manipulate it and visualise it. You will also learn how to access and manipulate images. 

This module is a must for anyone wishing to attend the upcoming Data Analysis in Medicine (DAIM) course.
